Package jnet

Class Bytes

java.lang.Object
jnet.Bytes
public class Bytes extends Object
Utilities to handle byte-string and byte-object operations.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    static final ByteOrder
    ORDER
    The expected order of all bytes used by this class.

  • Field Details

    • ORDER

      public static final ByteOrder ORDER
      The expected order of all bytes used by this class.

  • Method Details

    • intToBytes

      public static byte[] intToBytes(int n)
      Converts an integer to a byte array. This operation will always produce a byte array b such that b != null && b.length == 4.
      Parameters:
      n - the integer to convert.
      Returns:
      a byte array representation of n.

    • bytesToInt

      public static int bytesToInt(byte[] b)
      Converts a byte array to an integer. The passed array must not be null and must contain exactly 4 bytes. If the argument array is invalid, Integer.MIN_VALUE is returned
      Parameters:
      b - the byte array to convert
      Returns:
      the integer representation of b
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if b is null
      IllegalArgumentException - if b.length != Integer.SIZE / Byte.SIZE == 4

    • serialize

      public static byte[] serialize(Object object)
      Serializes an arbitrary object into a byte array. If the passed object == null or an IOException is thrown during serialization (e.g. the object is not Serializable), then null is returned and an error is logged using jnet.Log.
      Parameters:
      object - the object to serialize.
      Returns:
      a byte array representation of object
      See Also:
      • Log

    • deserialize

      public static Object deserialize(byte[] bytes)
      Deserializes an arbitrary byte array into an object. If the passed byte[] == null or an Exception is thrown during deserialization, then null is returned and an error is logged using jnet.Log.
      Parameters:
      bytes - the byte array to deserialize.
      Returns:
      the deserialized object (it is the responsibility of the caller to cast as appropriate)
      See Also:
      • Log

    • stringToBytes

      public static byte[] stringToBytes(String str)
      Converts a string to a byte array. This method is a wrapper for str.getBytes(). If str == null, null will be returned without an error being logged or thrown.
      Parameters:
      str - the string to convert.
      Returns:
      a byte[] representation of str.

    • bytesToString

      public static String bytesToString(byte[] bytes)
      Converts a byte array to a string. This method is a wrapper for new String(bytes). If bytes == null, null will be returned without an error being logged or thrown.
      Parameters:
      bytes - the byte array to convert.
      Returns:
      a String representation of bytes.
